name: bytestash
tagline: A self-hosted personal data store for organizing and searching private content
description: ByteStash is a self-hosted personal data warehouse designed to store notes, documents, or files in an organized searchable format. It offers a clean web interface and API access, ideal for centralizing personal data in a private cloud.

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Powerful search across all stored content. Find anything instantly

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Intuitive web UI for easy navigation. Beautiful design

features.title: REST API
features.description: Programmatic access for automation and integrations. Developer-friendly

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Self-hosted solution for complete data privacy. Your data, your server

features.title: Organized Storage
features.description: Keep all personal data in one searchable place. Never lose information
